summary: Paris, 1792: After France becomes a republic, aristocrats are guillotined. The English Sir Percy tries to save as many as he can as The Scarlet Pimpernel in disguises.
cast: Anthony Andrews|Jane Seymour|Ian McKellen|James Villiers|Eleanor David|Malcolm Jamieson|Denis Lill|Ann Firbank|Richard Morant|Julian Fellowes|Timothy Carlton|David Gant|John Quarmby|Gordon Gostelow|Carol MacReady|Tracey Childs|Joanna Dickens|Dominic Jephcott|Christopher Villiers|Geoffrey Toone|Sean Mathias|Daphne Anderson|Tony Caunter|Nick Brimble|Athene Fielding|Mark Drewry|Barrie Houghton|Kate Howard|Richard Charles|Preston Lockwood|Iris Everson|Gabrielle Parker|Derek Deadman|Carolyn Pertwee|Martine Copeland|Martin Wyldeck|Gavin Asher|James Payne|David Rolfe
keywords: character name as title|the scarlet pimpernel character|dauphin|guillotine|flower
title: La pimpinela escarlata
